function OnHelp () ColourNote ("white", "orange", "+++++++++++++++++++ PLUGIN HELP ++++++++++++++++++++") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "") ColourNote ("white", "orange", "*******************Help Commands********************") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "Automated Armor : armorhelpall ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "Automated Flight : flyhelp ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "Automated Cargo : cargohelp ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "Automated Research : researchhelp ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "Automated Ship Building: buildhelp upgradehelp ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "Automated Study : studyhelp ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "Automated TMC Voting : vote help ") ColourNote ("white", "orange", "****************************************************") ColourNote ("white", "orange", "") ColourNote ("white", "orange", "********************General Help********************") ColourNote ("red", "orange", "---------------------Galaxy Map---------------------") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "*Commands* ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "'showmap' - display the map window ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "'hidemap' - hide the map window ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "'hypmap' - Scan for new systems and plot to map ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "*GUI Interface* ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "The map window shows all the visible planets in the ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "galaxy. Planets will appear with a green dot with ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "the name above the planet. Hovering the mouse over a") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "planet will display the system name for that planet,") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "its X/Y coordinates, and bring up a path line to ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "all other planets. In the middle of each line it ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "will show the distance to that particular planet. ") ColourNote ("red", "orange", " ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "If you bring up the map while you are in space, the ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "planet you are on will have a red dot on it.Clicking") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "on a planet name will automatically plot a jump ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "within 500 units of the target planet, but you must ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "be in the cockpit of a ship for this to work. ") ColourNote ("red", "orange", "--------------------Chat Windows-------------------") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "The chat windows are already configured to sort all ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "ic and ooc channels in a logical manner. However, if") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "the windows are right clicked, there are several ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "options for copying hightlighted text, changing what") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "gets echoed to your main window and what channels ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "are displayed in each window. It is also noteworthy ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "to mention the windows support URL clicking to go to") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "a webpage automatically if a link is shown on OOC ") ColourNote ("red", "orange", "-------------------Color Capture--------------------") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "*Functionality* ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "- Highlight text and 'Ctrl+Left-Click' the text, ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "Character histories, descriptions, and craftable ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "items can all be customized by Lotj's supported ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "color tagging system. The color capture plugin ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "makes it very easy to capture colored text in game, ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "with the color tags embedded, to your clipboard. ") ColourNote ("red", "orange", "--------------------Auto Mapper---------------------") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "*Commands* ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "'mapper show' - display the map window ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "'mapper hide' - hide the map window ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "The mapper will automatically save room exits and ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "build a map as you walk around. The mouse wheel ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "allows for zooming in and out. Hovering over rooms ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "will show the name and clicking on them will plot a ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "path to the chosen room. Right clicking on rooms ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "will bring up options like delete or clear exits. ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "Other options found by clicking the * menu icon at ") ColourNote ("black", "orange", "the bottom left. ") end
